title: Topic 004 Question 050
body: You have an Azure Stack Hub integrated system linked to an Azure AD tenant named contoso.onmicrosoft.com.
You need to allow users in an Azure AD tenant named adatum.onmicrosoft.com to access Azure Stack Hub resources.
Which three actions should you perform in sequence? To answer, move the appropriate actions from the list of actions to the answer area and arrange them in the correct order.
